description: Device Specific Dashboard With Prometheus and Loki.

targets.expr: up{job="node_exporter", deployed_site="$site", type="$type", name="$device"}
#use blackbox_exporter

panels.description:
Is GPS Connected?
Is /dev/ublox_gnss File present?

targets.expr: # here check if that device file is present or not # use blackbox_exporter

panels.title: GPS

targets.expr:
time() 
-
max_over_time(
  timestamp(
    up{job="node_exporter", deployed_site="$site", type="$type", name="$device"} == 1
  )[48h:]
)
#use blackbox_exporter

panels.description:
Displayed RTK value.
-1 NO DGPS
0 DGPS
1 FLOAT
2 FIX

targets.expr: #use blackbox_exporter

panels.title: RTK

panels.description: Overall CPU Utilization over last 5 minutes
panels.title: CPU Utilization

targets.expr: 100 * (1 - (node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{job="node_exporter", deployed_site="$site", type="$type", name="$device"} / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="node_exporter", deployed_site="$site", type="$type", name="$device"}))

100 * (
  1 - (
    node_filesystem_avail_bytes{
      job="node_exporter",
      deployed_site="$site",
      type="$type",
      name="$device",
      mountpoint="/",
      fstype!~"tmpfs|overlay"
    }
    /
    node_filesystem_size_bytes{
      job="node_exporter",
      deployed_site="$site",
      type="$type",
      name="$device",
      mountpoint="/",
      fstype!~"tmpfs|overlay"
    }
  )
)
{deployed_site="$site", name="$device", type="$type", job="k7-app"}
{deployed_site="$site", name="$device", type="$type", job="rubix"}

100 * (
  1 - (
    node_filesystem_avail_bytes{
      job="node_exporter",
      deployed_site="$site",
      type="$type",
      name="$device",
      mountpoint="/",
      fstype!~"tmpfs|overlay"
    }
    /
    node_filesystem_size_bytes{
      job="node_exporter",
      deployed_site="$site",
      type="$type",
      name="$device",
      mountpoint="/",
      fstype!~"tmpfs|overlay"
    }
  )
)

title: Device Details
